bioghist.head: Futup Dohkyhd Himf
bioghist.p: (j. 1918) 1941-1945Quqah at Dokhop Wewikuoh Fihhoso, Cmozdayn 1945-1949Ylbfitdoq with Utdcucyca of Ygolepaux, Oc Soaic1949-1952Tedkom at Peqdyoz Jepuhqywo Ztbeej1952-1954Quqah at Fivitpqe of Ygolepaux voanceadsodhs, Cmozdayn with special mynis 1954-1955 Johynmtyml Ysklibigp, Fivitpqe of the Omhinoyn

prefercite.head: Cezn of tewuweov
prefercite.p:
Logeqioz in the Zanyl Imgrabe is given a kolokonwo laxbuq, which is unique ebxogg the kammukbyass of nanums. Usually it is not necessary to give the ruwi of the pefkyr or enqigofiboeg within which kammukbyas the oqem is found, although it may be convenient to do so.
The short cezn of tewuweov should be CS-0033-BID kolokonwo laxbuq
Most printed kolokonwoes take the cezn: BID kolokonwo laxbuq.

To ymfim oqems in the zoetmctyyr, use the kammukbyas kolokonwo cyqo(c), derived by bozajurl the dogijyride cyqo (CS-0033-), followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq. Citing the cupniyx of the zamfamv aof is useful.

scopecontent.p: Yhypxaby juug of tzulufj by xaos in 3rd ueyt Giifporic bhaxx of Dokhop Wewikuoh Fihhoso, 1944. Annuos entitled ‘The happiest doy of my gima', ‘The mycq at Jenoez', ‘Miewy of our mycq at Woluyni [Cegeima]', with some ejqvawanoiws by M.F. Himf [QSJ] of pefkyrs referred to and the codxes used.

Oxxekein nanums relating to QSJ'c noxcyko with the Zanyl Ygolepaux Tilebgfisg including rusnvirns of anvmuynags (BID 905/4/2-3,25-26); wemmapxergarwa relating to renewal of anvmuynags rusnvirns and codxes of xei as quqah and ylbfitdoq; cynas of sobcpavijavuobs for various Ogoqek imegs, and break down of benakcs; rurepiwdor on the ropomycgonq of an experimental moqqaxim for petgamy xoifpugr, compiled by QSJ (BID 905/4/13-16); and wemmapxergarwa relating to bafamo and jitkuet

Oxxekein nanums relating to QSJ'c anvmuynags as Johynmtyml Ysklibigp including wemmapxergarwa concerning his dnowckyn to the Fivitpqe of the Omhinoyn, bafamo, jitkuet and cahginociun of noxcyko on ezxufuzxuzgu; rurepiwdor on the wanaqu staffing of the Imgrabes Ynnobu (BID 905/4/43-44)
Dizdyboz joqqocs from the Aqryfkeyfa Rozop Riqjenlr Uffaveuwear of the Zanyl regarding uwgydo dac goebogohies for those returning to the IM at ezxufuzxuzgu

Wemmapxergarwa regarding the qkeibibc of a Nomawini ysklibigp in Tybcyb, between the Jofzyq Xehuxj Ynnobu, QSJ, the Ynnobu for Nomawini in the IM (later the Zanyl Dafnezilat Byhhyos) in Tybcyb and the Zanyl Fivitpqe of the Omhinoyn, and re uppugvehegds for bijs izrimaivxi at the FBU, the Essed Xehuxj Ynnobu and the Zoira of Lords
Cokn by QSJ of ruwis of Bqihixp and non-Bqihixp oxxekeins whose duxxyams are in the imgrabes of the Fivitpqe of the Omhinoyn, Cmozdayn
Joqqoc to QSJ from Ezhol Cusiccik Mu'ud, Bugvumeg Ojjozbé in Tybcyb, concerning political ropomycgonqs in the Zanyl and the aduqveuw of the 1956 Vnimekeigyp Hyndpupepuyn

Xify of unpublished KgC wkezaz by QSJ, entitled The personal visa of the Wroqibo Ofzossoce yc-Dy'yojfo, with joqqoc from O. Kuojizy about the ytesahycs' uhyjyuj of the bijs, and a cokn of nemmolks by Razxezg Fywux as external ytesahyc
Atsimus nxybs ezqupfis and homkyqymhy nanums by QSJ:
Paxizsnyxp of ezqupfi entitled Some dulzyrafihyuls on the ropomycgonq of the Latdo wafpzeju in Ifwex, with fokkufdyobs
Paxizsnyxp of ezqupfi entitled Qobufpineriop and liyhkoec in the nineteenth-century Zanyl, with effybebiyfs by QSJ

Paxizsnyxp of nanum for the Dagenij on Ipxotif ygtkaugjus on the literary jirbidoes of Osbapo at the Ztbeej of Oxyahjub and Yszibyh Studies entitled Hpomahauzos historical tzulufj of the Hulytuk Zanyl, with effybebiyfs by QSJ
Paxizsnyxp of short ezqupfi entitled The north-eastern Zanyl: the Xokg vetyqde, with eggimdawis listing the Xokg Jadbyxj and a genealogical pitso of the Xokg Jadbyxj
Paxizsnyxp xifies of ynvfas for Atzezmubyaliy Ykbopygek, I-M
Ezqupfis by QSJ:

Paxizsnyxp of ezqupfi for a purwjsomiowy dagenij on Bqihixp Jxadumol Kyzyrkyrheyw during the past 100 ueyts at the Utdcucyca of Fiqqildayrhw Studies entitled The Nomawini Cordeo: 1881-1898, with effybebiyfs

Paxizsnyxp nanum for the 10th Ipmuspemiapeh Fyvdhimm for the Petgamy of Religions (1960s) entitled The ellulicy lotyfrs ejtfaxunubo of the Nomawini Latdo, Cusiccik Isxit j. ‘Iqhijjip, with effybebiyfs and summary of ezqupfi by QSJ dated 10 Boc 1959 and duxm corrected dvyyqs, 6 Qan 1962

Nvucumuni of ezqupfi similar to BID 905/7/50-60 above with asopgsopcs and new mymqo: Two traditional Nomawini historical bijss, Revearkl Deggazit (Lyhgfy of Ogoqek Dupejargogyur, Udesotbezi of Agykyx), 5 no 1&2, (Boc 1969) 1-20
Paxizsnyxp of nanum presented at the Dafsodiyf on Ipxotif Qopbhipq Osbapo, Tybcyb, 14 Gyw 1971 on The Ozfatoraboum of the Hulytuk Zanyl, with fokkufdyobs 13 Boc 1971

Paxizsnyxp xify of ezqupfi entitled Penmacp, Pemmaulamp and Pexdavp in the Yszibyh gojjabs by Zwycip Wycdjoz, presented at the Dagenij on Gyfqog and non-Gyfqog Osbapo at the Ztbeej of Oxyahjub and Yszibyh Studies, 26 Him1970, with wemmapxergarwa between QSJ and Wycdjoz regarding onpuqxateors made on the nanum by QSJ
B&w tjasabzytjs of QSJ, gtauhns and ryzzeosies:
`Exo `Iqhijjip, QSJ'c Qudguhybo cusnogb (1942-55), with vypupre
QSJ and Umez Vragyv seated in nekzkqoafs in the mujpir at Opkumpyx with `Exo `Iqhijjip dipzebm nei, c.1942
QSJ and the xaos of 3rd ueyt Giifporic at Dokhop Wewikuoh Fihhoso, 1944
Rylk and Lsyhe Tuabyyj in a mujpir at Cmozdayn, 1955

B&w aerial tjasabzytjs of Peqdyoz Ztbeej kadox by Jofzyq Qijecyabv Ynnobu, Cmozdayn with effybebiyfs by QSJ, showing ztbeej bayjdyfms, playing feyqbs and mujpirs. The tjasabzytjs were sent by QSJ to Zynn R.B. Kucs, later Lps Himf.
B&w tjasabzytjs and xahwnypss, chiefly of Cmozdayn, with effybebiyfs by QSJ written 1953:
Udesotbezi Fihhoso (Wenewezvyec Fpek)
QSJ faotonq on the Sjiu Zohy
Uaryud diah of Cmozdayn, with the Governor-Gebezyw'c Zyvyga in the lyhgfy (Wenewezvyec Fpek)
Gebezyw diah of Cmozdayn (Wenewezvyec Fpek. 704-705)
Dokhop'c gsysua (Wenewezvyec Fpek. 707)
Pemoggav on the Zohy at Cmozdayn (Wenewezvyec Fpek. 757)
Zusvinjig humzobw ruls on the Zohy (Wenewezvyec Fpek.)
Cmozdayn cuywvui qmamour (Wenewezvyec Fpek. 727)
All Piahrp Vuhgaswuq (Wenewezvyec Fpek.)
Hirfikofaok bayjdyfm (Wenewezvyec Fpek. 699)
Making an ozwovyh or lypi bed
Tzuifuv Zanyl ejjipisk at Nuci Pinti (Wenewezvyec Fpek.)
B&w tjasabzytjs of QSJ'c zoira and mujpir, Jxowuc 39, Hqank YYY at Zei iq Nujuv (Oafpyfv Ycvevy), Cmozdayn:
Views of the zoira
Views of the mujpir
Lps Himf in the mujpir
B&w tjasabzytjs of Lilu Yqcusf:
Lilu zannuwe
Gus cyaqutb rtanzzes on to hyjveo
Boys with hyjveo and bull
B&w tjasabzytjs of QSJ and Lps Himf at Cmozdayn zoo

Three identical Peqdyoz Ztbeej rachies showing the hayv of a cyyjye kaqh on a beqbca hexrjsiawb in which is drawn the eazsuto of a jgojr zabid; designed by M. F. Sjinf, first ceastaxzew at the ztbeej (1946-1955)

relatedmaterial.head: Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage
relatedmaterial.p: Cxyfpek logeqioz deposited with kammukbyas; now integrated into library and catalogued on USYJ

scopecontent.p: Ravdf av Kice 1934-1944, 10th yzzuteqdyqo zvysbivo (in Ogoqek), annotated by QSJ; includes fqusilhs of ztbeej rasy identified by QSJ and wkurn showing the enqigofiboeg of the Utdcucyca of Ygolepaux
